CustomField.description: To differentiate status of the import with coloured labels
CustomField.formula:
Case( Text(tc9_imp__Status__c),
"Processed Successfully", (IMAGE(LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_260,FIND('/services',$Api.Partner_Server_URL_260))+"resource/tc9_imp__ts_import_images/ts_import_images/wordProcessed.png","Processed Successfully",20,88)),
"Processed With Errors", (IMAGE(LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_260,FIND('/services',$Api.Partner_Server_URL_260))+"resource/tc9_imp__ts_import_images/ts_import_images/wordError.png","Processed With Errors",20,88)),
"Validation Errors Exist", (IMAGE(LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_260,FIND('/services',$Api.Partner_Server_URL_260))+"resource/tc9_imp__ts_import_images/ts_import_images/valFailed.png","Validation Errors Exist",20,88)),
"No Validation Errors", (IMAGE(LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_260,FIND('/services',$Api.Partner_Server_URL_260))+"resource/tc9_imp__ts_import_images/ts_import_images/ValSuccess.png","No Validation Errors",20,88)),
"New", (IMAGE(LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_260,FIND('/services',$Api.Partner_Server_URL_260))+"resource/tc9_imp__ts_import_images/ts_import_images/WordNew.png","New",20,88)),
"Failed", (IMAGE(LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_260,FIND('/services',$Api.Partner_Server_URL_260))+"resource/tc9_imp__ts_import_images/ts_import_images/WordFailed.png","New",20,88)),
Text(tc9_imp__Status__c) )
CustomField.label: Import Status
